synopsis.text:
This delightful anime introduces us to the reserved high school freshman, Yuuko Konagai, whose world primarily revolves around her three unique cats. The lively and playful Munchkin Maa, the intelligent and dependable Russian Blue Rou, and the tender-hearted, emotional Singapura Shii fill Yuuko's life with warmth and companionship.

Yuuko's everyday life takes a turn when she befriends Shiratori Azumi, a fellow cat enthusiast who owns a Turkish Angora named Elza. As their friendship blossoms, the girls and their feline friends embark on charming little adventures that highlight the special bond between humans and their pets.

The anime beautifully captures the daily life of Yuuko and her cats, the growth of her friendship with Azumi, and the endearing interactions between the cats. With its heartwarming narrative and lovable characters, this series promises to leave viewers with a smile on their faces.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
